description: Create a dynamic /ideas/today page that redirects to the most recently posted startup idea for use in welcome emails

userStories.title: Create Ideas Manifest File
userStories.description: As the system, I need a manifest.json file that tracks all ideas with their publish dates so the redirect can determine which idea is most recent
acceptanceCriteria: Manifest contains an 'ideas' array with objects having: slug, title, publishedAt (ISO date)
Include existing idea: ai-meeting-notes-cleaner with publishedAt date of 2025-01-20
Ideas array is sorted by publishedAt descending (newest first)

userStories.title: Create Ideas Today API Endpoint
userStories.description: As a subscriber clicking the welcome email link, I want /ideas/today to redirect me to the most recent idea so I always see fresh content
acceptanceCriteria: Create api/ideas-today.js as a Vercel edge function
Function reads ideas/manifest.json to get the ideas array
Function extracts the first idea's slug (most recent due to sort order)
If manifest is empty or missing, redirect to /startup-ideas.html as fallback

userStories.title: Configure Vercel Routing for /ideas/today
userStories.description: As a subscriber, I want to visit /ideas/today (clean URL) and be routed to the API endpoint so the redirect works seamlessly
acceptanceCriteria: Add rewrite rule to vercel.json: source '/ideas/today' -> destination '/api/ideas-today'
Existing rewrites in vercel.json are preserved
Verify in browser manually: visiting /ideas/today redirects to the most recent idea page
userStories.notes: Manual browser verification required - Vercel rewrite configured
